=====================

# Coastal Imagery, Habitat Classification, and Shoreline Assessment for Canada

## Tender Details

**Reference Number:** cb-840-27872438
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** 30004325
**Publication Date:** March 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** April 16, 2024, 13:00:00 (Eastern Time)

## Service Description

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a Standing Offer to provide professional services for the design, implementation, review, and maintenance of coastal imaging and habitat classification data and products for all Canadian coasts. The successful contractor will utilize their expertise in coastal imaging, aerial imaging, ground truthing surveys, and data processing to produce open-source data products.

## Objectives

* Conduct coastal imaging, stills, video, and ground truthing surveys
* Characterize and map shoreline attributes
* Identify and characterize biologically significant species and habitats
* Characterize shoreline and nearshore species and habitats for wave exposure and oil residency indices
* Create databases and provide services
* Publish end products and reports

## Selection Criteria

The Department will evaluate bids based on lowest cost-per-point.

## Trade Agreements

The requirement is subject to the World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Pascal Busungu
* Contact Email: [pascal.busungu@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:pascal.busungu@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 1-506-429-6269
* Contact Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3C 2M6, Canada

## Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the Statement of Work, can be obtained from the Government Contracting Website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: April 16, 2024, 13:00:00 (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 13, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2029
